attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: It’s not what I was looking forward too at all my expectations were not met that’s all I gotta say ..... disappointment.

attributes.title: god awful
attributes.review: worst app i have ever downloaded. took hours to finish downloading and then my phone crashed. also, my location arrow has been on at the top of my screen since i downloaded? is this the government tracking me

attributes.title: donald trump racist✨🤲🏽🧚🏼‍♀️💩

attributes.title: DO NOT recommend
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. It made my phone freeze, also is app is racist and sexist.
